material = openmoc.Material()
with self.assertRaises(Exception):
    material.buildFissionMatrix()
self.test_material.buildFissionMatrix()
self.assertAlmostEqual(self.test_material.getFissionMatrixByGroup(1, 1), 0.0015
    )
self.assertAlmostEqual(self.test_material.getFissionMatrixByGroup(2, 1), 0.325)
